summary: Importing EV3 library and initializing an EV3 object with USB protocol.

details.comment: Importing EV3 library and initializing an EV3 object with USB protocol.
details.content:
import ev3_dc as ev3
protocol_param = dict(protocol=ev3.USB)
my_ev3 = ev3.EV3(**protocol_param) # working!
my_ev3.verbosity = 1
